mapper.select: SELECT bNum, bId, bPw, bTitle, bContent, bUser, bDate, bHit FROM board where bNum > 0 ORDER BY bNum DESC LIMIT #{startPage}, #{perPageNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (bTitle, bId, bPw, bContent, bUser, bHit) values (#{bTitle},#{bId},#{bPw},#{bContent},#{bUser},0)
mapper.update: UPDATE board set bHit = bHit+1 where bNum = #{bNum}
UPDATE board set TITLE = #{bTitle}, CONTENT = #{bContent} where bNum #{bNum}
